Share generation and reconstruction:
-----------------------------------
$ gcc sss-deal.c sss.h sss_source.c -o sss-deal -lgmp -lcrypto
$ gcc sss-recon.c sss.h sss_source.c -o sss-recon -lgmp -lcrypto

Test 1:
Input: $ ./sss-deal 6754356 3 5
Output: Prime used: 8431320066896739469712845538371488735878675438209136227763428344988039771511
Share 1: (1, 7343799811857679024391684654305530745541626707462996861160395377481050119619)

Share 3: (3, 6361019094848853787206296772056367175825313406769056586650491948690162637917)
Share 4: (4, 6465758632879088995342069773873161596446048836821255678743621487406271562463)
Share 5: (5, 6967918101932422754630154070984206820719378987139567590402138528196748930607)

Share Refresh:
-------------
$ gcc sss-refresh.c sss.h sss_source.c -o sss-refresh -lgmp -lcrypto
